channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Hag - (Neutral Killer)
channel.description:
** The Hag - Neutral Killer**
**Passive 1: Driven** Immune to death at night
**Passive 2: Remedy Studies** Immune to Nightshade and bleeding.
**Day Ability 1: Toxification** Bleed (Cult) / Poison (Unseen) a player. (4 uses)
**Day Ability 2: Madness Potion** [1-Day Cooldown] Make a player believe to Bleed (Cult) / Poison (Unseen). When someone heals the player, it kills them instead. (Infinite use)
**Night Ability 1: Drug** Causes a player to believe they were attacked and healed. (3 uses)
**Night Ability 2: Charmed** Causes a player visited you to have incorrect results. (4 uses)
Win Condition: Must kill all members of the main factions in order to win.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Hag - (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Nerbins
item.description:
[Neutral killer] The Hag

The Hag
Neutral killing
Passive: Unholy vitality
If you are attacked at night while you have a hex active, you will activate the hex and draw the life energy from the victims to survive the attack.
Day ability: Hex
(day, infinite uses, 2 day cool down) Hex three players. If none of them are dead in two days time, the hex will activate and kill them all. They will be informed of being hexed, but not of who else is hexed.
Night ability: Mind warp
(infinite uses, 1-day cool down) Cause a player to receive incorrect feedback from their abilities tonight.
Night ability: Mind numb
(infinite uses, 1-day cool down) Occupy everyone who you have hexed.

[Class Suggestion] The Elder (BD Social) and The Hag (Unseen Social)

The Hag

Unseen Social

Unique

Passive (Herbal Wisdom) ~ Immune to Bleeding and Nightshade. You will keep this Passive, even if your Class Changes.
Passive (Keen Ears) ~ See all day abilities being performed (Does see who used them), Does not see abilities used by neutrals.

Day Ability (Nosy) ~ Listen in on the Prince tonight. (2 uses)
Day Ability 2 (Invoke) ~ Disable Target’s Passives For Current Day and Night. Can be Used During The King’s Election Phase. Target Will Not Receive A Notification. Does not remove death and conversion immunity. (3 uses)

Night Ability (Educate) ~ Target Unseen Member Will Know the Identity of all Players Visiting Them. (3 Uses)
Night Ability 2 (Astonish) ~ Frame Target and Receive the Feedback of the Ability the Target Used Last Night. (Infinite Uses)

Goal: Defeat the Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek to do you harm.
